Menu.Name: Add
Menu.Description: Press the Add button to add your entry to the queue of entries that will be sent to the server. Your data will be validated when you click Add.

Menu.Name: Submit
Menu.Description: Pressing the Submit button will send all of your added entries to the server. You will receive and alert stating that your submission was sent and was successfully received.

Menu.Name: DARPA Office
Menu.Description:
The name of the DARPA Office supporting the program.
Select a single value.

Menu.Name: DARPA Program Name
Menu.Description:
The name of the DARPA program funding the project.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Long Name
Menu.Description:
If your Program Name is an abbreviation, include the full name of the program.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Program Teams
Menu.Description:
The names of the performer teams participating in your project.
Type text to initiate autocomplete. To enter multiple values, press the Enter key.

Menu.Name: Link
Menu.Description:
The link to your program’s web page on darpa.mil.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Display Software Columns
Menu.Description:
These are the titles of all of the columns that will be publicly displayed on your program’s software page. They correspond to the fields of meta data requested about each software component. Drag and drop the checkboxes into the order in which you want them displayed, and uncheck any boxes that you do not want displayed on your page.
Select or unselect multiple checkboxes.
Menu.Example: Team, Project, Description, Instructional Material, Category, Code, Stats, License

Menu.Name: Display Pubs Columns
Menu.Description:
These are the titles of all of the columns that will be publicly displayed on your program’s publication page. They correspond to the fields of meta data requested about each publication component. Drag and drop the checkboxes into the order in which you want them displayed, and uncheck any boxes that you do not want displayed on your page.
Select or unselect multiple checkboxes.

Menu.Name: Description
Menu.Description:
Describe the purpose and goals of your program. This description must be vetted and approved through DARPA Public Affairs.
Type a text value.
Menu.Example: XDATA is developing an open source software library for big data to help overcome the challenges of effectively scaling to modern data volume and characteristics.

Menu.Name: Program Manager Link
Menu.Description:
A link to the program manager’s biography page on darpa.mil.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Program Manager
Menu.Description:
The program manager's name.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Program Manager Email
Menu.Description:
The program manager's email address.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Image
Menu.Description:
If you would like to include an image for your program, include its file name (online location) here. You will also need to submit the image itself along with the rest of your materials by email to the Open Catalog development team. If you choose not to include an image, please leave blank.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: DARPA Program
Menu.Description:
The name of the DARPA program for which the software was developed.
Type text to initiate autocomplete. To enter multiple values, press the Enter key.

Menu.Name: Software
Menu.Description:
The name of the software package itself.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Program Teams
Menu.Description:
The names of all of the teams that worked on the software.
Type text to initiate autocomplete. To enter multiple values, press the Enter key.

Menu.Name: Contributors
Menu.Description:
The names of additional parties contributing to the advancement of the code repo. If there are none, please leave blank.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Sub-contractors
Menu.Description:
The names of contractors hired by the Program Teams. If there are none, please leave blank.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Internal Link
Menu.Description:
A link to the software for internal use, which will not be shared publicly. If the software has no site for internal use, please leave blank.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: External Link
Menu.Description:
A link to your software’s website. This will be publicly visible. If your software has no public website, please leave blank.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: License
Menu.Description:
The licensing regime for your software. Please review the license-content.json file for the appropriate list of abbreviations to be used in this field.
Type text to initiate autocomplete. To enter multiple values, press the Enter key.

Menu.Name: Platform Requirements
Menu.Description:
List any requirements the software may have for server settings or setup. If there are none, please leave blank.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Dependent Modules
Menu.Description:
If the software has any additional optional components that can extend or expand the software, list their names here. If there are none, please leave blank.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Dependent Module URLs
Menu.Description:
List the URLs of the Dependent Modules' public code repositories (if applicable). If there are none, please leave blank.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Component Modules
Menu.Description:
If the software requires any additional components in order to run, list them here. If there are none, please leave blank.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Component Module URLs
Menu.Description:
List the URLs of the Component Modules' public code repositories (if applicable). If there are none, please leave blank.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Industry
Menu.Description:
If your software is targeted at one specific industry, include that industry here. If there are none, please leave blank.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Functionality
Menu.Description:
This field allows visitors unfamiliar with the Catalog to search for software based on keywords related to what the software does.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Public Code Repo
Menu.Description:
If your code is publicly available on the Internet, put the link to the code here. This link will not be clickable, as it may be necessary to open it outside of a browser environment in order to view the code repo itself. If your code is not publicly available, enter 'Not Yet Available'. If your software will be publicly available in the near future, please place the anticipated future date in this field; preferably in ISO 8601 format (i.e. 2016-02-29 or 2016-02).
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Categories
Menu.Description:
The category (or categories) that this particular piece of software fits into to differentiate it from other pieces of software in the same DARPA program. Categories are likely to be domain specific to your DARPA program. XDATA has three: Analytics, Visualization, and Infrastructure. Categories should be internally consistent, so look at those already in use to consider normalization of this data point. This field is pre-populated with categories currently live on the site.
Type text to initiate autocomplete. To enter multiple values, press the Enter key.

Menu.Name: Description
Menu.Description:
Describe what the software is, what it does, and why it’s useful. A non-expert should be able to understand this. Please append a parenthetical listing of the primary coding language used in the program’s development.
Type a text value.
Menu.Example: Tangelo provides a flexible HTML5 web server architecture that cleanly separates your web applications (pure JavaScript, HTML, and CSS) and web services (pure Python).

Menu.Name: Instructional Material
Menu.Description:
A link to online instructions, guides, and manuals pertaining to the software. If there is no link, please leave blank.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Stats
Menu.Description:
This is a link that displays daily, weekly, monthly and yearly software commits. If there is no link, please leave blank.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Internal Code Repo
Menu.Description:
A link to code that is not publicly available and can only be found in DARPA's internal tools repository. If there is no link, please leave blank.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Languages
Menu.Description:
Programming language(s) used to develop software code. If you are unsure of the languages, please leave blank.
Type text to initiate autocomplete. To enter multiple values, press the Enter key.

Menu.Name: Dependent modules
Menu.Description:
The software package(s) necessary to create a development environment or application. If there are no dependent modules, please leave blank.
Type text to initiate autocomplete. To enter multiple values, press the Enter key.

Menu.Name: Dependent module URLs
Menu.Description:
A link to dependent software package(s) necessary to create a development environment or application. If there is no link, please leave blank.
Type text to initiate autocomplete. To enter multiple values, press the Enter key.

Menu.Name: Component modules
Menu.Description:
An independent, pluggable software package that services the software solution. If there is no link, please leave blank.
Type text to initiate autocomplete. To enter multiple values, press the Enter key.

Menu.Name: Component module URLs
Menu.Description:
A link to independent, pluggable software package(s) that services the software solution. If there is no link, please leave blank.
Type text to initiate autocomplete. To enter multiple values, press the Enter key.

Menu.Name: DARPA Program
Menu.Description:
The name of the DARPA program for which the publication was written.
Type text to initiate autocomplete. To enter multiple values, press the Enter key.

Menu.Name: Authors
Menu.Description:
The names of the publication’s authors in First Name, Middle Initial, Last Name order.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Program Teams
Menu.Description:
The names of all of the teams that worked on the software.
Type text to initiate autocomplete. To enter multiple values, press the Enter key.

Menu.Name: Link
Menu.Description:
A publicly available link to the publication. Ideally, this should be a link directly to the file itself (if available). If the publication has not been published yet, please enter: Not Yet Published.
Type a text value.

Menu.Name: Title
Menu.Description:
The publication’s title, in standard US English title capitalization format and omitting any final period.
Type a text value.
Menu.Example: Overplotting: Unified Solutions under Abstract Rendering

Menu.Name: Categories
Menu.Description:
Selected based on the latest classification tree by ACM: http://www.acm.org/about/class/class/2012. If there are none, please leave blank.
Type text to initiate autocomplete. To enter multiple values, press the Enter key.

Menu.Name: Subcategories
Menu.Description:
If the categories given need to be broken down further, do so by specifying subcategories here, following the same principles listed for Categories. If there are none, please leave blank. This field is pre-populated with categories currently live on the site.
Type text to initiate autocomplete. To enter multiple values, press the Enter key.

Menu.Name: ACM 1998 classification code
Menu.Description:
The appropriate ACM classification code(s) for the publication. If there are none, please leave blank.
Type a text value.
